Name: Noodles with basil
Description: Authenicate Thai noodle dish with different levels of spice depending on birds' eye chilis amounts. This goes well with a simple stir-fry like bak choi greens

Name: Puerto Rican Chicken and Rice
Description: Arroz con pollo is made in one pan. This comforting dish is easy to make and the pefect nourishing weekenight meal.

Name: Vegan Burgers and Fries
Description: Burger and fries made in the airy fryer. Impossible or Beyond burgers can be used
